titleStmt.title: The practical gauger, being a plain and easie method of gauging all sorts of brewing vessels whereunto is added, a short synopsis of the laws of excise / by John Mayne.
titleStmt.author: Mayne, John, fl. 1673-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.G. for N. Brooke,

notesStmt.note: "A short synopsis or index of the laws of excise" has special t.p.
